title: Symmetric Cryptography Asymmetric CryptographySymmetric Key
extract: Asymmetrical Encryption. Asymmetrical encryption is also known as public key cryptography, which is a relatively new method, compared to symmetric encryption. Asymmetric encryption uses two keys to encrypt a plain text. Secret keys are exchanged over the Internet or a large network.Dec 31, 2015
extract_html: Asymmetrical Encryption. Asymmetrical encryption is also known as public key cryptography, which is a relatively new method, compared to symmetric encryption. Asymmetric encryption uses two keys to encrypt a plain text. Secret keys are exchanged over the Internet or a large network.Dec 31, 2015
